name: Kung Fu Legend
description:
A great journey awaits as you travel through a colorful vibrant world in the pursuit of one day becoming a true kung fu master.
You will experience an open-world adventure with lots of humor and stimulating combat.

Top down bullet-hell-style battles
On your journey, you will meet many other kung fu fighters, that you will face in battles, that involves your best skills. Damage your opponent by getting close to them and start punching, but be careful, meanwhile you'll have to be quick on your feet and avoid projectiles and obstacles, that will cause damage to you.
When you are in big trouble, you can use your dash ability, to quickly launch yourself away from tight situations, if need be.


All sorts of whimsical characters
The world is filled with lots of humoristic and funny people. You will meet all sorts of great characters, some are hilarious, some are simply just weird, but all are part of your adventure.


Head to the dojos for a proper challenge
The act of becoming a kung fu master is no easy task. In order to prove your worth, you'll need to beat the dojos, which are the hardest challenges of them all. For every dojo that you manage to overcome, you'll get a dojo belt. Only when you have the 10 dojo belts can you call yourself a true kung fu master.
